abstract: Senator Joseph I. Lieberman, an Independent who is allied with the Democratic majority in the Senate, will not seek re-election, but he has consulted with two Republican hopefuls in Connecticut, further irritating his former party; some Connecticut Democrats, who are eying the party's nomination for his seat are not particularly interested in getting his support.
snippet: Senator Joseph I. Lieberman, who will not seek re-election, has consulted with two Republican hopefuls in Connecticut, further irritating his former party.
lead_paragraph: Senator Joseph I. Lieberman, who will not seek re-election, has consulted with two Republican hopefuls in Connecticut, further irritating his former party.

headline.main: In Race to Replace Him, Lieberman Again Has Liberals Shaking Their Heads
headline.print_headline: In Race to Replace Him, Lieberman Again Has Liberals Shaking Their Heads
headline.seo: Lieberman Irks Democrats Before Race for His Senate Seat
